scripts.test: echo 'Error: no test suite implemented yet. See tests/ directory' && exit 1
scripts.lint: echo 'Linter not configured. Install eslint with: npm install --save-dev eslint' && exit 1
scripts.lint:check: echo 'Linter not configured. Install eslint with: npm install --save-dev eslint'
scripts.type-check: echo 'TypeScript not configured. This is a JavaScript project'
scripts.format: echo 'Formatter not configured. Install prettier with: npm install --save-dev prettier' && exit 1
scripts.format:check: echo 'Formatter not configured. Install prettier with: npm install --save-dev prettier'
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && npm run test
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint && npm run format
